channel.title: 508 wont compile
channel.description: is this correct cuse everytime it wont compile it says it [code]The system cannot find the path specified. javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: \bulby\rs2\players\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: \bulby\rs2\players\update\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\players\items\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\players\combat\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\io\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\io\packets\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\net\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\util\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\world\mapdata\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\world\items\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . . [/code] And then i checked the compiler and it has the right java dictonary and the update and current JDK UPDATE [code]@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -d ./bin/ ./bulby/rs2/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ /bulby/rs2/players/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ /bulby/rs2/players/update/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/players/items/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/players/combat/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/io/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/io/packets/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/net/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/util/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/world/items/*.java pause[/code]

item.title: 508 wont compile
item.dc:creator: @dannydude8 dannydude8
item.description:
@dannydude8 wrote:

is this correct cuse everytime it wont compile it says it

The system cannot find the path specified. javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: \bulby\rs2\players\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: \bulby\rs2\players\update\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\players\items\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\players\combat\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\io\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\io\packets\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\net\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\util\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\world\mapdata\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options javac: file not found: .\bulby\rs2\world\items\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .
And then i checked the compiler and it has the right java dictonary and the update and current JDK UPDATE

@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -d ./bin/ ./bulby/rs2/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ /bulby/rs2/players/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ /bulby/rs2/players/update/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/players/items/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/players/combat/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/io/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/io/packets/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/net/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/util/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/world/items/*.java pause
